review_text: 소스가...너무 절어요 ㅠㅠ 요즘 백종원 정검란다고 해서 먹어봄 고기적건에 나오기해욤 맛있습니다 양도 많고욤 다만..소스양 적음 ㅠㅠ 촉촉하게 비벼먹고싶어욤 ㅠ 한개는 소스반만들어갔는데..안비벼짐...ㅠ 그래도 맛은 변함 없이 좋네요
translated_review: The sauce... It's too salty ㅠㅠ. I tried it because I've heard a lot about Baek Jong-won's recommendation lately. The meat portion is generous and it's delicious. The serving size is large too. However... There's not enough sauce ㅠㅠ. I want to mix it so it's more moist ㅠ. One of my portions barely had any sauce... I couldn't mix it well...ㅠ But the taste is still as good as ever.

review_text: 춘장이 부족한거 같아요 예전보다 맛이 약해지는듯..맛있었는데 아쉽네요
translated_review: It seems like there's not enough black bean sauce. The flavor isn't as strong as it used to be... It used to be delicious, so it's a bit disappointing.
The food is delicious and the service is friendly :)
